QuestionTxt: (I'm going to read you a list of specific elements or parts of the (2010 health care) law. For each, please tell me whether you think it is something the law does, or not.) To the best of your knowledge, would you say the health reform law does or does not...eliminate out-of-pocket costs for many preventive services such as annual check-ups and cholesterol screenings?
SubPopulation: Asked of Form A half sample
StudyNote: 753 respondents were interviewed on a landline telephone, and 751 were interviewed on a cell phone, including 415 who had no landline telephone.

RespTxt: No, law does not do this
